means: 紧急地，不容分说地，专横地

sentence.Network_en: "Hello!" the voice said, more peremptorily. "Who is it? Who do you want?"
sentence.Network_cn: “喂！”那声音更加霸道地说道，“谁啊？你要干什么？”

sentence.Network_en: Their propaganda was peremptorily switched to an anti - Western line.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的宣传断然地转而持反对西方的路线.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 摘录------英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译... ... peregrine 隼 peremptorily 紧急地 peremptoriness 专横.
their propaganda was peremptorily switched to an anti-Western line .他们的宣传断然地转而持反对西方的路线。
当箭在弦上时，他把悉数军器一股脑(Peremptorily)都抛了出来。实际上，知识属于我们每个人,我们每个人都要掌握知识。
decidedly中文 ... 断然= decidedly 断然= peremptorily ... deeplyingplacenta 低置胎盘.

list.abs: say peevishly 气恼地说say peremptorily 专断地说say perfectly 熟练地背诵
demand to ask for urgently or peremptorily ., 要求迫切或专横要求.

entry.def: Someone who does something in a peremptory way does it in a way that shows that they expect to be obeyed immediately.

example.ex: With a brief, almost peremptory gesture he pointed to a chair.
example.tran: 他做了一个简单的手势，近乎霸道地指着椅子。

means.word_mean: 1. in an imperative and commanding manner

auth_sentence.content: It was peremptorily wound up due to pressures from the oil lobby.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was peremptorily wound up due to pressures from the oil lobby.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was peremptorily wound up due to pressures from the oil lobby.

auth_sentence.content: Lee said peremptorily, "I never saw it," and resumed reading.
auth_sentence.res_content: Lee said peremptorily, "I never saw it," and resumed reading.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Lee said peremptorily, "I never saw it," and resumed reading.
